tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Vishwas is very friendly, transparent and practical. He listens to patients really well and takes time to explain the issues in detail and provides best solution to it. He doesn't exaggerate issues. He is very practical, he gives examples of his own experiences and make patients understand the issue in a better way. He neither prescribes unnecessary medicine nor recommend any outside products to babies. He takes time to councel parents on parenting tips in a friendly manner. I highly recommend Dr. Vishwas to everyone. The best pediatrician have ever met so far.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Went for consultation on food allergy for our little baby, doctor accommodated us in between his appointments schedule.. he listened to us patiently and clarified us on all our doubts and gave recommendations on introduction of new food..

Friendly, good listener, understanding, practical *** **** *************** gives confidence & feeling of visiting a good Doctor whom you can trust and rely upon..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** **** ********** It was first consultation with him... He is very friendly and explains the condition well. Gives proper instructions about diet too... He doesnt give too many medicines & won't prescribe antibiotic in the first place... Nice experience

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My son at his 30 days he developed Atopic dermatitis through out his face and neck that was annoying us.But at our first visit itself,sir has given assurance that it would reduce ...but might take a month....After application of his prescribed lotion.... today our son regained his healthy skin.Thank you

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It is not about the doctor but about the staff who are working in the hospital... Is there any one trained the staff to suggest go and check in Columbia Asia hospital... Twice I faced the issue one is for my wife and another time is with my son

I don't know why ...if that is the case why i should  come to your hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He was very friendly and he explained us why the infection has occurred in detail 

also has explained why each medication is being prescribed on what can be missed and what cannot be missed 

also told us tips on how this kind of infections can be avoided while travelling. 

Good experience with the doctor over all

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I normally will not write reviews.I have taken my kid for on and off high grade fever. Doctor have suggested us to join *** ******* ******* *** **** ***** **** **** ******* *********** *** * **** *************.Fever came 99.8 like that once and after that they said we have to stay for 2 more days saying they will change **** **** antibiotics ***** *** ***** *** ***** ****.When I asked the kid is not dehydrated and doing good,they said some infection still there.I have taken voluntary discharge from hospital.** ********* ***** ****** *** *** ********* ** **** ** *********** ** ** ***** ***** ******* ******* **** ***** ** ****** *** ***** ** *** *** ** ***** ***** I regret still going there due to which my kid have suffered.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: He is very good..My son had viral infection .. he is better now . Thank you so much doctor.  I would recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are happy with his treatment and giving good explanation. I Feel he is attacking problems in proper way. Happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is the most sweet-natured paediatrician... believes low dosage and natural treatment..suggests healthy diet..apart from correct treatment, understands the child's temperament and does his best to keep the child comfortable

review:
****** ** **** *** ** the clinic 200 rupees were charged extra as we have taken appointment on Sunday .Although I have taken appointment from practo where mentioned fees was 500 but I have paid 700 which is quite disappointing.
Behaviour of reception staff is quite disappointing.
I just want to ask if u r not following policies of practo  then why are you taking applications from practo on Sunday.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doc Vishwas is extremely patient and approachable.  He explains the details of the most important things that parents need to know. Being a new parent it is very comforting and crucial to know the information. His methods are also very organic and doesn't push medication unless required. Definitely will vouch for him.

review: *** ** *** **** ************ * **** **** ** ****** ****** all our generation habituated with anti biotic which is not good for us. at least our kids shouldn't do same mistake.best thing in doctor he will give last preference to anti biotic first normal medicines only and will.not.prefer unnecessary tests.
